name: NPR
text:
Louis DeJoy promised some top election officials today that mailed ballots would be the Postal Service's top priority this fall.

He said a new task force will look at each mail processing plant and assess what it may need to handle high volumes of mail.

 He also touched on facing an invisible enemy ‚Äî without naming the coronavirus directly. https://t.co/XfAYErTWuo
